### What to do for Week 1 after class ends

```{r eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
unchecked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("square", fill = "#4682b4"))

checked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("square-check", fill = "#4682b4"))

wk_post <- tibble(
"Submit" = c(unchecked,
             unchecked,
             unchecked,
             checked, 
             checked,
             unchecked,
             unchecked),

Description = c("Read <i>The What and the Why of Statistics</i> in the text",
                "Download the Stock Chapter 1 Powerpoint and Lecture Textbook Notes",
                "Download the in-class Chapter 1 Slideshow",
                "Begin the <i>Introduction to R</i> module on Data Camp",
               "Complete problems 3, 4, 6, 7, and 8 in Chapter 1",
               "Join the class Slack channel after recieving an invite",
               "Sign up for RStudio.cloud or download and install both R and RStudio"),

Location = c("[Link](/readings/01-reading/#book-stuff)",
             "[Link](/materials/01-content/#textbook-notes-and-presentation)",
             "[Link](/materials/01-content/#in-class-presentation)",
             "[Link](/datacamp/01-module/)", 
             "[Link](/tasks/01-tasks/#week-1-problem-set)",
             "[Link](/tasks/01-tasks/#class-slack-account-access)",
             "[Link](/tasks/01-tasks/#class-software)"

  )
) %>%
  mutate(Link = paste0("<a href=", str_extract_all(Location, "(?<=\\().+?(?=\\))"), "> <i class='fa-solid fa-link' style='color:#ff598f'></i> </a>")) %>%
  select(-Location)

```

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
kable(wk_post, 
      escape = FALSE,
      align = 'clccc') %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = FALSE) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "10em") %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "30em") %>%
  column_spec(3, width = "10em") %>%
  row_spec(0:nrow(wk_post), extra_css = 'vertical-align: middle !important;', background = "#212121", color = "#ffffff")
```
